page.title: 08The Bishop of Lewes
page.content: The village if Litlington is joined for worship with West Dean and is served by one vicar.Litlington seems to have well attended services,but West Dean has a scant congregation.At present both are in the charge of the Bishop of Lewes,who combines pastoral duties with the work of a bishop. Bishop Peter is Sussex born,and with his identical twin,the Bishop of Jarrow,is a co-founder of "The Community of The Glorious Ascension". Living the life of a monk he wears a brown habit and sandals instead of the customary purple cassock.He lives in the Rectory at Litlington where he helps young men to adapt to adult life before starting their chosen career.He is very well known in Sussex, broadcasting on television and radio. He has a jolly,kindly personality and is a popular religious figure.
